questions.question: My computer __________ every time I open Visual Studio.
Organisations are __________ turning to algorithms to automate or support decision-making.
Google has an Application programming interface (API) that __________ users to get information about maps.
Data structure provides a way of organizing, managing, and storing data __________.
What is the error I got "Segmentation Fault (Core __________)" in the C language?
The time complexity is the amount of time __________ by an algorithm to run, as a function of the length of the input.
A client-server system is a system in which some computers (the clients), __________ services provided by other computers, the servers.
Cyber security is the practice of defending computers, servers, mobile devices, electronic systems, networks, and data from __________ attacks.
If you get back late, I __________  angry.
I have __________ three essays this week.
If I _________  you, I would get a new job.
I __________  my football team would win.
If we had arrived earlier, we __________ John.
I ___________ there long when she quit.
If he ______________ a musician, he would have recorded a CD.
He was working in the garden when he ___________ the money.
